content:
Hi,

I am getting the following error(s) when setting up HAPI FHIR Server v2.4 in DSTU3 version mode and then trying to run upload-definitions with the version attribute set to DSTU3

Error on the server:
WARN c.u.f.r.s.i.ExceptionHandlingInterceptor - Failure during REST processing: ca.uhn.fhir.rest.server.exceptions.InvalidRequestException: Invalid resource reference found at path[StructureDefinition.snapshot.element.binding.valueSet] - Resource type is unknown or not supported on this server - http:/build.fhir.org/valueset-request-intent.html

Error on the client:
14:16:20 ERROR ca.uhn.fhir.cli.App - Error during execution:
ca.uhn.fhir.rest.server.exceptions.InvalidRequestException: HTTP 400 Bad Request: Invalid resource reference found at path[StructureDefinition.snapshot.element.binding.valueSet] - Resource type is unknown or not supported on this server - http:/build.fhir.org/valueset-request-intent.html
at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance0(Native Method)
at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(Unknown Source)
at sun.reflect.DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstance(Unknown Source)
at ca.uhn.fhir.rest.server.exceptions.BaseServerResponseException.newInstance(BaseServerResponseException.java:306)
at ca.uhn.fhir.rest.client.BaseClient.invokeClient(BaseClient.java:290)
at ca.uhn.fhir.rest.client.GenericClient$BaseClientExecutable.invoke(GenericClient.java:741)
at ca.uhn.fhir.rest.client.GenericClient$UpdateInternal.execute(GenericClient.java:2615)
at ca.uhn.fhir.rest.client.GenericClient$UpdateInternal.execute(GenericClient.java:2553)
at ca.uhn.fhir.cli.ValidationDataUploader.uploadDstu3Profiles(ValidationDataUploader.java:300)
at ca.uhn.fhir.cli.ValidationDataUploader.uploadDefinitionsDstu3(ValidationDataUploader.java:249)
at ca.uhn.fhir.cli.ValidationDataUploader.run(ValidationDataUploader.java:71)
at ca.uhn.fhir.cli.App.main(App.java:188)

Commands:
Server: hapi-fhir-cli.cmd run-server --allow-external-refs -f dstu3 -p 61198
Client: hapi-fhir-cli upload-definitions -f dstu3 -t http://localhost:61198/baseDstu3/

Anybody with similar experiences and hopefully a solution?

-Kenneth
